InstallationÔÉÅ

Note: PyPontem runs on Python 3.12 and above. We recommend installing it in a virtual environment by following the steps below.

Step 1: (Optional) Create a Virtual Environment

Use Conda to create and activate a virtual environment:

conda create -n pypontem_env python=3.12.3 jupyter
conda activate pypontem_env

Step 2: Install PyPontem

Once inside the virtual environment, install PyPontem using pip:

            pip install pypontem
